description:
The very first of its kind. It plays song and has interactive display (click handprint for play/pause music)

- Made with css and javascript coding. (no flash player required)
- Plays 3 different soundtrack from tokyo ghoul.
- Volumn adjustment button
- 4 different wallpaper that change simultaneously.
- one click play pause
- Classic digital clock.
- Runs smoothly on any pc. best aspect ratio 16:9
- Interactive effect on mouse pointer.


IT'S JUST FOR FUN. DON'T FORGET TO RATE SHARE AND FOLLOW. ENJOY!!
title: Tokyo Ghoul (V.2) - most amazing web wallpaper (updated with one click music play/pause and volume adjustment button)
